events.message: The applicant completed and submitted the personal loan application form, detailing their need for medical expense coverage.
The loan application was categorized under Personal Loan due to keywords indicating medical and personal expense requirements.
A loan officer specializing in personal loans was assigned to handle the application and support the applicant through the process.
The loan officer conducted the initial review of the submitted documents and personal details to verify eligibility for the personal loan.
Additional documents were requested from the applicant to prove income stability and validate medical bills related to the loan purpose.
The applicant submitted all requested documents, including recent pay slips and medical invoices within the specified deadline.
The credit check was completed, revealing the applicant's credit score is acceptable with a history of timely repayments.
A risk assessment was performed, indicating moderate risk but supporting loan approval given the applicant’s stable income.
An offer was presented to the applicant including loan terms, interest rate, repayment plan, and expected disbursement timeline.
The applicant responded positively to the offer, expressing satisfaction with the terms and readiness to proceed with the loan.
The application was officially approved by the loan committee, clearing the way for the loan to be funded promptly.
The loan amount was successfully disbursed to the applicant’s bank account to cover the intended medical expenses immediately.
A follow-up was conducted with the applicant to ensure satisfaction with the loan process and address any questions about repayments.
The loan application case was formally closed after successful funding and confirmation of applicant satisfaction with the process.
